column4: curious I am wondering is winbind and winbindd (the services) linux's service to make the linux samba software function as a domain controller. Essentially is all you need on your machine samba and windbind to make your computer into a linux domain controller ?
I am almost 99% sure it is
looking at the packages with dpkg -L windbind  , apt-cache search ...etc
I'm unfamiliar with samba.  You could ask around in #debian, ##linux, or #ubuntu-server
